Pretty fun, plus hey, extra models for Gmod! That's a plus.

I started playing this game a couple of years ago. Despite this, I've fallen in love with this gem of a Counter-Strike game.
I'm a simple guy with multiplayer games, so CS:GO, while a fun game, sometimes turns me off with the loot boxes and the news feed and a whole lot of stuff I don't care about.

I launch CS:S, and I can jump right into a game. There's really nothing but the game, either. And I couldn't love it more for that. The best multiplayer games will entice and keep people pulled in with the gameplay alone, and CS:S accomplishes that. Plus, starting a bot server and playing by yourself can be fun. And don't forget all the modes like surfing and zombies that are here, too.

It may not be at its prime, but any Counter-Strike fan will definitely get his or her $10 and much more out of this. I recommend this wholeheartedly.

great game for competitive and casual players for casual players you have the jailbreak gamemode ( if you get put with a good bunch of lads its the funniest gamemode ever ) and deathmatch , gungame and overall casual 9v9 , and for competitive players you have dedicated clans , and it is pretty easy to find 5v5 PUG Games and you have great maps if you come from csgo to source you can see how maps have evolved not to mention the esports theres community run tournaments with a pretty big prize pool
